divs: sighting detailsdriving west down 50 hwy, i had seen a bright light to the north of the highway. i kept looking at it. it looked like a search light at first but was not moving, it was getting brighter and more pronounced into a triangle shape (with three lights). there was a lighter colored object to the west side of the light that also became a 3 lighted triangle. (my friend that was driving also saw the lights after i had mentioned something.) these two objects were hovering. the lights began to fade one after another after a good 3 minutes and small violet\blue objects shot off and headed west in a straight line. the very last violet\blue light was quickly flying around the other lights. there was no sound, nothing else in the air at the time.
